Package com.intellij.formatting

Class RightEdgeAlignmentProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.formatting.AbstractBlockAlignmentProcessor
      • com.intellij.formatting.RightEdgeAlignmentProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BlockAlignmentProcessor

    public class RightEdgeAlignmentProcessor
extends AbstractBlockAlignmentProcessor
    BlockAlignmentProcessor implementation for Alignment that anchors to the right block edge.
